channel.title: CVE Feed for libwww-perl -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for libwww-perl -- all products

item.title: CVE-2014-3230|2024-08-06T10:35:57.043Z -- libwww-perl -- lwp%3A%3Aprotocol%3A%3Ahttps
item.description: The libwww-perl LWP::Protocol::https module 6.04 through 6.06 for Perl, when using IO::Socket::SSL as the SSL socket class, allows attackers to disable server certificate validation via the (1) HTTPS_CA_DIR or (2) HTTPS_CA_FILE environment variable.
